ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT - flowers
ygData.msgSnippet: You can also get druids to forage Firiona Roses for you in Firiona Vie. Kit ... From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@yahoo.com] Sent: Tuesday, 29 May, 2001 8:54
ygData.messageBody:
You can also get druids to forage Firiona Roses for you in Firiona Vie.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: Tuesday, 29 May, 2001 8:54 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] OT - flowers



Yup. Crypt in Mistmoore and also, check you favorite alchemy vendor --
they sell some items look likeflowers as well.
Henrik Holm <HEH@...> wrote: Pick one up in Castle Mistmore it
spawns in the crypt i think?

Musiker
